description: A set of optics made to fit on laser weapons, which will diffract the laser beam into several lower powered beams.  This increases point-blank damage, but greatly reduces range.
A set of optics to concentrate the laser beam on a smaller focus point.  This increases range and damage output, but complicates targeting.

A set of high-tech electronics and optics.  This converts a laser pistol into a less-lethal electrolaser capable of stunning targets, at the cost of decreased damage output and increased power consumption.
A set of electronics to optimize emitter workcycle and increase overall energy efficiency.  Decreases power consumption.
A capacitor with a higher energy density increases range and damage, at the cost of doubling power consumption.
